item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, September 6, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC

1. [Opinion] How an economist optimises their morning routine
2. Porn streamer OnlyFans paid owner $630mn in dividends
3. Top Fed officials leave door open for large interest rate cuts if data worsens
4. Elon Musk’s China dream stalls as hybrids rush past Tesla
